1118540.name: BlueGlow - Operation Blue Rain
1118540.description:
This Free DLC adds Operation Blue Rain into the Operations mode for BlueGlow. The new Operations mode adds longer objective and story based missions to BlueGlow. More Operations will come soon with Operation Blue Rain kicking off the new stream of content.

Operation Blue Rain has you sneak into a military base to steal the enemy's data. Quietly enter and move through the base. Kill all of the enemy, or sneak past them, it's all up to the player. Steal the data and try to escape. This is the first of the Operations with more coming soon.
